translation.privacy_policy_description: We care about your privacy and want you to understand how we handle your information. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it!
translation.email_address: Email Address: When you sign up or log in to save or upload sound buttons to our database.
translation.user_content: User Content: Comments, feedback, and any other content you share.
translation.log_data: Log Data: Includes your IP address, browser type, the pages you visit, and the time spent on those pages. This data is stored only to track the general behavior of our audience so that we can provide a better user experience on our website.
translation.cookies_description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. Cookies are small files stored on your device to have a smoother experience when you visit our website next time.
translation.why_do_we_use_your_information: Why Do We Use Your Information?
translation.to_provide_our_service: To Provide Our Service: Ensuring everything works smoothly.
translation.to_improve_our_service: To Improve Our Service: Understanding how you use our site so we can make it better.
translation.to_protect: To Protect: Keeping our site safe and secure.
translation.we_do_not_sell_your_information: We do not sell your information. Information of users on Soundeffectbuttons is confidential and secure. Be careful if you receive any spam mail asking for personal information or banking details; we never ask our users for such information. This is a free soundboard platform aimed at helping creators use interactive sound effects in memes, YouTube videos, and personal use.
translation.we_work_hard_to_keep_your_information_sa: We work hard to keep your information safe. Your sound buttons are uploaded via a secure 256-bit encrypted SSL connection, ensuring that all the sounds on the website are virus-free, which is verified twice before uploading.
translation.access_your_data: Access Your Data: Ask us what information we have about you.
translation.correct_your_data: Correct Your Data: Fix any incorrect information about you by emailing us at richdreamcreators@gmail.com.
translation.data_recovery: Data Recovery: We are pleased to help you if your uploaded data is not found. Please write to us, and our experts will revert within 24 working hours.
translation.contact_info: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at richdreamcreators@gmail.com.
translation.dmca_policy_intro: SoundEffectButtons, referred to here as 'we', has adopted the general policy under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. The address to receive notification for claimed infringement is mentioned at the end of this policy. A proper legal procedure to resolve the matter will be followed in good faith.
translation.reporting_infringement_intro: If you believe that content is on the website or accessible through our website, please send a notice of copyright infringement containing the following information:
translation.physical_or_electronic_signature: A physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright that has been allegedly infringed.
translation.identification_of_copyrighted_material: Identification of the copyrighted material being infringed.
translation.information_about_infringing_material: Information regarding allegedly infringing material, including the location with sufficient details so that we can find and verify its existence.
translation.notifier_contact_information: Contact information about the notifier, including address, telephone number, and, if available, e-mail address.
translation.notifier_statement_of_belief: A statement that the notifier has a strong belief that the material is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
translation.statement_under_penalty_of_perjury: A statement made under penalty of perjury that the information provided is accurate and the notifying party is authorized to make the complaint on behalf of the copyright owner.
translation.takedown_notice_response: If we receive a takedown notice regarding infringement of the material/content on our website as per the steps mentioned above, we will consider the request to remove the material only after the verification of the request.
translation.counter_notice_description: However, we are also liable to submit a counter-notice if we have good faith that either the alleged material is not infringing or the person is not authorized to submit such a request. The due procedure will be followed while applying for the counter-notice. Also, the original complaining party will be informed regarding any action taken, and we expect the same from the original party regarding any development of their legal actions.
translation.contact_for_infringement_notice: To send a notice regarding claimed infringement, please email us at richdreamcreators@gmail.com.
translation.about_us_intro: Hey! I am an independent woman living with my beloved grandparents and I am a software developer by profession. The reason behind creating this sound button website is to have an easily-accessible cloud library of meme sounds from YouTube, funny voices, games, pranks, etc. During the pandemic, I used social media platforms a lot to watch memes and humor videos, and I believe you all have done the same! But at a particular point, you know, I felt all the sounds/memes were already heard/seen. And I was literally so free that I wanted to explore more sound effects from different countries, people, and cultures. Thus finally, I created this website which is like a plethora of never-ending sound effects with sound buttons collected from across the world. I hope you like my work, keep supporting and keep laughing.
translation.what_makes_us_different_description: At SoundEffectButtons, we‚Äôre not just another soundboard. Our extensive library features a curated collection of the latest and greatest meme sounds, TikTok audio clips, and classic favorites. We prioritize user experience, ensuring our platform is easy to navigate and offers high-quality audio downloads. Our unique categorization and search functionality make finding the perfect sound effortless, setting us apart in a crowded digital landscape.
translation.goal_description: We aim to provide an extensive library of trending sounds, making it easy for creators to find and use the perfect audio for their projects.
translation.vision_description: We envision a vibrant community where creativity flourishes through sound. By connecting users with the latest audio trends, we aspire to inspire and empower self-expression in every project.
